means: 不适当的，失策的，不可取的

sentence.Network_en: It would have been impolitic to refuse his offer.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时若拒绝了他的好意当然是不明智的。

sentence.Network_en: I had thought it impolitic to smoke a cigar while pleading poverty.
sentence.Network_cn: 我以前想,一面闹穷,一面又抽雪茄是失礼的.

sentence.Network_en: That's impolitic and impolite, but it's not asas Mr. Bush's response.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是不当和无礼的, 但没有布什先生的回应那么槽糕.

GRE逆序_馆档网 ... peripatetic 巡游的 impolitic 不智的，失策的 sybaritic 奢侈享乐的.
dupe的翻译... ... Black-and-white dupe positive film 黑白翻正片(摄影) impolitic 失策的, 不得当的... cordate 心脏形的.

list.abs: impolite是什么意思|impolite的中文意思... ... (for) 考虑到; be impolite ： 没规矩 IMPOLITE ENCOUNTERS ： 非常套用语.
Hurt by their impolite words , he flared up ., 由于他们那些不礼貌的话伤害了他 , 他突然发火了.
speaking with your mouth full is very impolite ., 嘴里塞满食物时讲话是很不礼貌的.
She ordered that impolite fellow out ., 她责令那个无礼的家伙出去.

sentences.sentence: "an impolitic approach to a sensitive issue"

auth_sentence.content: Reid is prone to crassly impolitic remarks.

auth_sentence.content: Somehow, it was all too fierce and sarcastic, too impolitic.
